entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -38.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pond Inlet Airport 04:53 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -38.6°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -42.5°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Ice fog at times early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
